narrative.inOrderTo: add a session to a course
narrative.iWantTo: add my session to a course

scenario.title: Adding session to a course
scenario.step: Given a set of detail of a session

When the system list all the course, enter OS3 as course code which has a course id 3 AND the system list all the tutor, user select "cylon" with a tutor id 1 AND the select "WEEKLY" for session type and select 1 for compulsory AND the system will auto generate a session id which is 2 and create the session
